attributes.action: Thursday, April 23 - Public Holiday - St George's Day
attributes.additional_details: Scotland, Wales and Ireland all recognise St Andrew's Day, St David's Day and St Patrick's Day respecfully as Public Holidays. I think it's about time that we made St George's Day a public holiday so that England too can celebrate it's national identity.I aim to gather at least 100,000 signatures and petition Government to debate this subject and allow common sense to prevail.
